artist: Author: Ronni Tarlet , et al.; Publisher: Ronni Tarlet , Seattle, Wash.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photo-collage of letterpress text and photographic image of eclipse in totality printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 58 pp.
title: The Missing Peace: Truth and Justice in Israel / Palestine
